title: Verify the promotion is displayed when the user update the patron in the cart with a patron which is associated with triat and promotion.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Trait- protected promotion should be created
2. Buyer type should be set for that promotion
3. ?Trait Restricted Promotion Requires 
Trait-Associated Patron? should be set to True in 
AFP
2. Login to PV with valid credentials
3. Navigate to Ticketing --> Ticket Sales
4. Select an event
5. Verify that when no patron is in context, 
trait-protected promotions does not appear in the 
selection list.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Prerequisite should be successfully completed
2. Login should be successful and the home page of the application should be launched
3. Ticket Sales page should be displayed
4. Event should be selected
5. Trait-protected promotions should not appear in 
the selection list.

title: Verify ISM shows the protected buyer types when the MyTixx patron has no associated traits.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create a TraitGroup TGX of Targeted_Promotion type
Create a trait TRAITX belonging to TGX
Create a promotion PROMOX, add promotiionTrait association with TRAITX, and associate it with buyer type BTX
Create a patron and has no association to traits created above.
EVENTX  can be sold at buyer type BTX 
PATRONX  have access to EVENTX 
Trait ID Req should be true
2. Login to My Tixx using above patron id.
3. Click on Buy Tickets tab
4. Click on View Seat Map button
5. Verify the protected buyer types are not available in the ISM
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Prerequisite should be successfully completed

1. Create a TraitGroup TGX of Targeted_Promotion type 
Create a trait TRAITX belonging to TGX 
Create a promotion PROMOX, add promotiionTrait association with TRAITX, and associate it with buyer type BTX 
Create a patronTrait association between PATRONX and TRAITX 
EVENTX  can be sold at buyer type BTX 
PATRONX  have access to EVENTX
2. Login to PV with valid credentials
3. Navigate to Promotion Administration from Ticketing Setup
4. Select Supplier and search with the promotion name
5. Verify that the user is able to Add a Trait to the existing promotion
6. Verify that the user is able to Activate the Trait
7. Verify that the user is able to Deactivate the Trait
8. Log into DB
Verify in the audit history table that  rows added in the audit history table for the changes made to the Trait restrictions
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be completed
2. Login should be successful and the home page of the application should be launched
3. Promotion Administration Portal should be displayed
4. Promotion Page should be displayed with the promotion you have created
5. New Trait should be added
6. Trait should be activated
7. Trait should be deactivated
8. Changes made to a promotion?s trait restrictions should be recorded to the audit logs
